001package org.consensusj.bitcoin.json.conversion;
002
003import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonParser;
004import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException;
005import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonToken;
006import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.DeserializationContext;
007import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonDeserializer;
008import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.exc.InvalidFormatException;
009import org.bitcoinj.core.Block;
010import org.bitcoinj.core.NetworkParameters;
011import org.bitcoinj.core.ProtocolException;
012
013import java.io.IOException;
014import java.nio.ByteBuffer;
015
016/**
017 *
018 */
019public class BlockHexDeserializer extends JsonDeserializer<Block> {
020    private final NetworkParameters netParams;
021
022    public BlockHexDeserializer(NetworkParameters netParams) {
023        this.netParams = netParams;
024    }
025
026    @Override
027    public Block deserialize(JsonParser p, DeserializationContext ctxt) throws IOException, JsonProcessingException {
028        JsonToken token = p.getCurrentToken();
029        switch (token) {
030            case VALUE_STRING:
031                try {
032                    byte[] payload = HexUtil.hexStringToByteArray(p.getValueAsString()); // convert  to hex
033                    return netParams.getDefaultSerializer().makeBlock(ByteBuffer.wrap(payload));
034                } catch (ProtocolException e) {
035                    throw new InvalidFormatException(p, "Invalid Block", p.getValueAsString(), Block.class);
036                }
037            default:
038                return (Block) ctxt.handleUnexpectedToken(Block.class, p);
039        }
040    }
041}
